thread.title: Sovereign-Wealth Funds Oppose Asset Manager ‘Super-Profits’
thread.title_full: Sovereign-Wealth Funds Oppose Asset Manager ‘Super-Profits’ - WSJ

author: Simon Clark
title: Sovereign-Wealth Funds Oppose Asset Manager ‘Super-Profits’
text:
Sovereign-wealth fund chiefs who manage hundreds of billions of dollars say outsize fees charged by the finance industry have lowered their investment returns and created “super-profits” for a few asset managers.
Representatives of funds including the Abu Dhabi Investment Authority, China Investment Corp. and the New Zealand Superannuation Fund gathered in Milan Wednesday for the annual meeting of the International Forum of...
